title: New: Daniel Wilson – The Exercise
body: With the same kind of modern soul as **Sam Smith’s** [Lay Me Down](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/19327-new-sam-smith-lay-me-down/), the main distinction between the aforementioned track and **Daniel Wilson** is the production budget. Not to come across as condescending, but I’m fairly sure that **Wilson** would be one of the first to admit that  he could perhaps to do with a state of the art recording studio, however, it is what it is, and given the relative constraints he faces, it’s a wonder that he produces tracks to the quality of _The Exercise_. Relying upon Wilson’s flexible yet emotive vocals and a slightly choppy organ section, it’s a plea as much as anything, and it’s fantastic.
